layer at (0,0) size 800x600
  LayoutView at (0,0) size 800x600
layer at (0,0) size 800x134
  LayoutBlockFlow {html} at (0,0) size 800x134
    LayoutBlockFlow {body} at (8,16) size 784x110
      LayoutBlockFlow {p} at (0,0) size 784x18
        LayoutText {#text} at (0,0) size 320x18
          text run at (0,0) width 320: "In this test, the TFOOT text should be left aligned"
      LayoutTable {table} at (0,34) size 181x76 [border: (1px outset #808080)]
        LayoutTableSection {thead} at (1,1) size 179x26
          LayoutTableRow {tr} at (0,2) size 179x22
            LayoutTableCell {td} at (2,2) size 175x22 [border: (1px inset #808080)] [r=0 c=0 rs=1 cs=1]
              LayoutText {#text} at (2,2) size 170x18
                text run at (2,2) width 170: "This text is in the THEAD"
        LayoutTableSection {tfoot} at (1,51) size 179x24
          LayoutTableRow {tr} at (0,0) size 179x22
